actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that cigarette advertising is not a deductible business expense.

summary.text: Provides that under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 cigarette advertising shall not be allowed as a deductible business expense. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 162)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that cigarette advertising is not a deductible business expense.
